Html:
One instruction is mentioned first time on page 89; “ Next, add an Order class (Order.cs) with the following code”. The same instruction is then repeated at page 121: “ Right-click on the Models folder and add a class named Order”. If there is only one Order.cs, then the 2nd instruction should be: “Open the file Order.cs”. Or, perhaps there may be two files named the same: Order.cs. Please clarify this confusion.

Thank you
